titleStmt.title: Resolved upon the question by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament that all and every the ministers throughout the kingdoms of England and Ireland, Dominion of Wales, and town of Berwick upon Twede, do and are hereby required and enjoyned in their publick prayers to pray for the Kings most Excellent Majesty ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Macock and Francis Tyton ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title and first 4 lines of text.
At head of title: Die Mercurii, 9. May 1660.
"Die Mercurii, 9. May 1660. Ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that these resolves be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Browne, cleric Parliamentorum."
Identified on film as Wing E2264 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
